UserImportInstructions:
• A fájl CSV formátumban szükséges.
  • Username and email are required fields.
  • Attribute validity will not be enforced.
  • Leaving other fields blank will set default values and 'password' as the user's password.
  • Use the supplied template as an example.

ResourceImportInstructions:
• A fájl CSV formátumban kell, hogy legyen UTF-8 kódolással.
  • Name is required field. Leaving other fields blank will set default values.
  • Status options are 'Available', 'Unavailable' and 'Hidden'.
  • Color should be the hex value. ex) #ffffff.
  • Auto assign and approval columns can be true or false.
  • Attribute validity will not be enforced.
  • Comma separate multiple resource groups.
  • Use the supplied template as an example.
ReservationImportInstructions:
• A fájl CSV formátumban kell, hogy legyen UTF-8 kódolással.
  • Email, resource names, begin, and end are required fields.
  • Begin and end require full date time. Recommended format is YYYY-mm-dd HH:mm (2017-12-31 20:30).
  • Rules, conflicts, and valid time slots will not be checked.
  • Notifications will not be sent.
  • Attribute validity will not be enforced.
  • Comma separate multiple resource names.
  • Use the supplied template as an example.
